title: A Year of Telepathy
description: Article URL: https://neuralink.com/blog/a-year-of-telepathy/ Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43019352 Points: 30 # Comments: 32
author: julianh65
excerpt: Over the past year, three people with paralysis have received Neuralink implants. This blog post explores how each person is using Telepathy in everyday life.
